data.scheme_name: Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar Udhyog Uday Yojana for SC/ST Entrepreneurs for MSME - Assistance in implementation of Information and Communication Technology (ICT) - SC/ST -Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides assistance of  75% of capital expenditure related to ICT facilities subject to a maximum amount of Rs.5 lakhs.
data.eligibility: Enterprises which have done capital expenditure on the equipments required for use of Information and Communication Technology (ICT) as a media of communication, networking with hardware for accessing cloud computing shall be eligible
data.conditions:
1. Enterprise which has installed/Subscribed cloud computing (public cloud /private cloud/hybrid cloud) will be eligible for the expenditure of equipment (such as networking equipment, like switches, routers, backup devices, servers, computers etc.) required for used of ICT as a media of communication, networking with hardware for accessing cloud computing will be eligible under the scheme
  2. The capital cost does not include the software part of the ICT system.
  3. The Enterprise is eligible for maximum three applications with total assistance of maximum Rs.5.00 lakh during operative period of the scheme.
  4. This scheme will be supplementary to such scheme of Government of India. However, in no case total assistance from Government of Gujarat and Government of India should exceed more than actual expenditure incurred by MSME for said purpose.
  5. The expenditure incurred must be within the time period of one year before the date of installation of cloud computing system
  6. Date of last bill of expenditure (as per CA certified expenditure statement) need to be consider as date of installation of ICT system.
  7. Supplier for the equipment/hardware must be from OEMs/authorized distributors/dealers having GST registration.
  8. Service and Trading activities are ineligible for assistance under this scheme. 9. CA Certified Expenditure Statement is required.
data.beneficiaries: All industries which have done capital expenditure on the equipments required for use of Information and Communication Technology (ICT) as a media of communication, networking with hardware for accessing cloud computing shall be eligible
data.prerequisites:
1. Enterprise which has installed/Subscribed cloud computing (public cloud /private cloud/hybrid cloud) will be eligible for the expenditure of equipment (such as networking equipment, like switches, routers, backup devices, servers, computers etc.) required for used of ICT as a media of communication, networking with hardware for accessing cloud computing will be eligible under the scheme
  2. The capital cost does not include the software part of the ICT system.
  3. The Enterprise is eligible for maximum three applications with total assistance of maximum Rs.5.00 lakh during operative period of the scheme.
  4. This scheme will be supplementary to such scheme of Government of India. However, in no case total assistance from Government of Gujarat and Government of India should exceed more than actual expenditure incurred by MSME for said purpose.
  5. The expenditure incurred must be within the time period of one year before the date of installation of cloud computing system
  6. Date of last bill of expenditure (as per CA certified expenditure statement) need to be consider as date of installation of ICT system.
  7. Supplier for the equipment/hardware must be from OEMs/authorized distributors/dealers having GST registration.
  8. Service and Trading activities are ineligible for assistance under this scheme. 9. CA Certified Expenditure Statement is required.
data.context: The primary mission of The Industrial Policy 2020 includes support for development of MSMEs., focus on Export Competitiveness: Vocal for Local to become Global and thus integrated value chains across product segments.
data.objective: To provide financial assistance on the basis of capital expenditure done on ICT equipments.
data.description: Assistance of 75% of the capital expenditure related to ICT facilities will be provided, subject to maximum limit of Rs. 5 lakhs.
data.how_to_apply: Enterprise have to apply online on IFP Portal (https://ifp.gujarat.gov.in) and hard copy at concern DIC office within six months from the date of agreement of rent/lease deed. https://msmec.gujarat.gov.in/uploads/pdf/_-VdMLnyaXMSXXqKScmJmBtMnyfM7KYI.pdf
data.funding_facilitator: Industries and Mines Department, Government of Gujarat
data.funding_mechanism: The assistance will be release after the approval by Industries Commissioner
data.additional_info: The enterprise that has availed assistance under this component cannot avail asssistance under any other scheme of other department of state government for the same component providing similar benefit. However, Enterprise can avail under such schemes of Government of India, if any.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Signed copy of Application form* 
2. Copy of Udyam Registration (if applicable) 
3. Constitution of Enterprise (Memorandum of association, partnership deed etc) 
4. Copy of PAN Card of Enterprise 
5. Copy of PAN Card of Applicant/Promoters/Directors/partners and authorised signatory 
6. CA certificate for fixed capital investment 
7. Expenditure Statement (CA Certified) 
8. Undertaking for any assistance from GoG and GoI* 
9. Copy of the bill of expenditure occurred 
10. Copy of Audited Balance sheet/ ITR of the last financial year 
11. Copy of last electricity bill 
12. Copy of Gujarat Pollution Control Board approved NOC/Consent & other departments approval (if applicable) 
13. Certified copy of Brief project report regarding ICT /cloud computing including benefit analysis 
14. GST Registration certificate (if applicable) 
15. Self-Attested documents/ details to be submitted by the Authorized Person 
16. Power of attorney/ Board resolution letter/consent letter 
17. Supporting documents for SC/ST Enterprise 
https://ic.gujarat.gov.in/documents/pagecontent/CA-Certified-Expenditure-StatementAX-04-
data.checklist_info_d:
Address:
